thread.title: MOVES-Citigroup names head of UK, Ireland corporate and investment banking
thread.title_full: MOVES-Citigroup names head of UK, Ireland corporate and investment banking | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: MOVES-Citigroup names head of UK, Ireland corporate and investment banking
text:
July 6 Citigroup Inc promoted Michael Lavelle to head of UK and Ireland corporate and investment banking and vice chairman of EMEA CIB with immediate effect, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters.
Lavelle will also become a member of the global leadership group, according to the memo.
During his 19 years with Citi, Lavelle has led the bank's EMEA equity capital markets business before leading the combined EMEA debt capital markets and ECM businesses under the capital markets origination (CMO) umbrella.
Lavelle will report to Manolo Falc√≥, the memo said. (Reporting by Lehar Maan in Bengaluru)
